job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: I am hiring #DataScientist in #Seattle WA for a renowned #pharmaceutuical client.<br><br>Qualification and Experience:<br>• BS degree with 4+ years of experience, a M.Sc. degree with 2+ years of experience or a recent PhD in Statistics, Biostatistics, Computer Science, Bioinformatics or similar fields<br>• Strong desire to learn with an interest in immuno-oncology and cellular therapy<br>• Experienced in interdisciplinary collaborations at the interface of data science and life sciences<br>• Proficient in good coding practices<br>• Command of data science stack of tools: R/Python, notebooks and git<br>• Experience with R Shiny, Dash, Plotly, Streamlit, or other reactive visualization framework<br>• Experience with APIs, or ability to quickly learn how to use them (e.g., R httr or Python requests)<br>• Experienced in data visualization and analytics<br>• Experienced in setting up data workflows that interface with diverse ecosystem of data platforms and APIs<br>• Computing proficiency: Base knowledge of Linux OS and interaction with cloud-resources particularly AWS<br><br>Preferred: <br>• Experience with practicing Agile<br>• Preferred: Experience with clinical data practices and standards<br>• Preferred: Experience working with omics and/or flow cytometry data<br>• Preferred: Experience with CI/CD framework and SQL<br>
